ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] system crash
ygData.msgSnippet: He will have to reprogram his hot keys and his friends list.. Other than that he won t loose anything.  The characters, inventory, etc. are stored on the
ygData.messageBody:
He will have to reprogram his hot keys and his friends list.. Other than
that he won't loose anything. The characters, inventory, etc. are stored on
the servers. Nothing to worry about. :)

Duhase

-----Original Message-----
From: iamchickaddd [mailto:iamchickaddd@...]
Sent: Friday, January 04, 2002 5:12 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] system crash



I'm just a mom asking for my son who plays EverQuest...our system crashed
and we're having to reinstall everything... including EverQuest...will he
lose his character, powers, etc...and have to start all over?

Thanks,
Bonnie



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
